text:
As a Main Street entrepreneur, it's sad that Senate Democrats have blocked $250 billion of additional aid for small businesses. The PPP fund will soon run out of money and more businesses will close their doors while Democrats block additional relief.
https://t.co/A0R2KZFlg4
